remember.label: Remember the secret key for this session.
remember.hint: When enabled, the key will be stored until the tab is closed and reused for further payments.

multipleSignersThresholdInfo: Threshold for this action: {{threshold}}. Typically, at least {{requiredSigners}} signers are required (depending on their weights).

localFlow.title: Alle Signaturen lokal eingeben & senden
localFlow.body: In this dialogue, you enter all the necessary secret keys locally on this device. Then the transaction is fully signed and sent directly to the network.
localFlow.stepAllKeys: Enter all required secret keys on this device.
localFlow.stepSend: The transaction is then fully signed and sent directly.

multisigOptions.title: Signature options for this multisig account

distributed.title: Standard: Distributed Multisig-Flow
distributed.body: By default, this session signs only with your own private key. Additional signatures are supplemented via exported XDR files or a job ID from other signers.

localAll.title: Enter all signatures locally
localAll.body: Choose this option only if you control all the secret keys associated with this account (z. B. nach einer Kontorettung mit mehreren Unterzeichnern). The Stellar Account Manager will then gather all the signatures locally and send the transaction directly to Horizon.
localAll.checkboxLabel: Enter all signatures locally in this dialogue and send them directly.
localAll.warning: Note: When you enter all the signatures locally, all private keys are present in this session. Use this option only on trusted devices.

summary.single: This account uses a single signature.

multisigInfo.masterHint: The master account is the currently loaded account from which this operation originates.
multisigInfo.masterExplanation: The master account corresponds to the currently loaded account. Initially, it had all the rights before additional signers were added.

jobSign.masterOnly: Only the master key of this account can sign for this step.
jobSign.anyActive: Master weight is 0. Please enter the secret key of one of the listed signers with weight > 0.
